name: Rat Cage
description:
Synopsis
In RatCage, you are a rat who wanders into a suspicious building on a freezing winter night. Hide from the suspicious figures that appear in the building, solve puzzles, and get through the snowstorm night safely.

Overview
The game is a simple side-scrolling 3D action game. You can move forward, backward, left and right, jump, and grab things.
This game was created with the theme of a weak animal wandering into a very suspicious building and getting into trouble.
The building has several areas with puzzles and action gimmicks. As you progress through the game, try to imagine what this building is.

Game features
・Let's capture various puzzles and action gimmicks. The player becomes a little clever mouse and spends a dangerous night.
・There is a scary figure in the building, but the mouse can't go back. Go deeper and deeper and feel the secrets of the building.
